name: UTair India Pvt. Ltd
tag_list: chardham-yatra-by-helicopter, chardham-helicopter-package, do-dham-yatra-by-helicopter, badrinath-yatra-by-helicopter, kedarnath-yatra-by-helicopter, helicopter-services-in-india, rent-helicopter-in-india
overview:
UTair India Pvt. Ltd. holds a Non-Scheduled Air Operator Permit (Helicopters) issued by Director General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) India to provide exclusively helicopter services. It has its main base at New Delhi.

UTair India Pvt. Ltd. is the first company to bring in 100% FDI in civil helicopter aviation sector in India under the liberalized FDI policy of the Government of India. UTair India is the group subsidiary of UTair Aviation of Russia and has been set up to develop the helicopter operations in the Asia and Pacific region. We provide helicopter transport services to the various sectors such as flying for Tourism, Pilgrimage, Corporates, Geophysical surveys/mapping, film shooting/photography, etc. The company also offers services to oil and gas sector besides other sectors in India and countries in the region by using suitable type of helicopters.

Our parent Company UTair Aviation (www.utair.com) is the biggest helicopter service provider in Russia having an annual turnover of over USD 2 billion and a fleet of more than 350 helicopters of different types. It is among the world’s top civil helicopter operators by volume of operations.
